alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Jones; Shackelford; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 8:23PM CDT until June 02 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Haskell County in west central Texas... Northeastern Jones County in west central Texas... Shackelford County in west central Texas... Throckmorton County in west central Texas... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 822 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Weinert to Paint Creek to near Funston, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Lake Stamford Marina and Irby around 830 PM CDT. Lueders around 835 PM CDT. Millers Creek Reservoir around 845 PM CDT. Fort Griffin around 900 PM CDT. Albany and Throckmorton around 905 PM CDT. Woodson around 910 PM CDT. Ibex and Elbert around 920 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Funston, Mccarty Lake, The Intersection Of Us-183 And Us-283, Us- 183 Near The Throckmorton-Baylor County Line, Us- 277 Near The Haskell-Knox County Line, Lusk, The Intersection Of Us- 380 And Highway 222, Big Country Baptist Assembly, The Intersection Of Us-283 And Ranch Road 209 and Us-180 Near The Shackelford- Stephens County Line. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
